comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: I suspect it is this fellow: "Stiliyan Kovachev (Bulgarian: Стилиян Ковачев) (born on 26 February 1860 in Yambol, died on 11 July 1939 in Sofia) was a Bulgarian General." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stiliyan_Kovachev This is probably a pre-1915 photo.

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: Artolog: it does look like it is the same guy.  We will update the record.  Thanks.
